description: This file defines a React functional component 'ParallaxLayer' that renders a movable layer for parallax scrolling effects. It uses a custom hook 'useParallax' to compute scroll-based transformation and respects user preferences for reduced motion.

methods.name: ParallaxLayer({ speed = 0.2, children, style })
methods.description: React component that renders a layer which moves with scroll at a specified speed, respecting reduced motion preferences.

ctags.name: ParallaxLayer
ctags.pattern: /^export default function ParallaxLayer({ speed = 0.2, children, style }) {$/
